Sentence: They head to London to crown Edward and to give new titles to Richard and George
George is so upset by Edward's new marriage that he (Edward) leaves with Somerset to join with Warwick
Seeing George on the enemy's side, Edward gives up the throne and consents to be imprisoned at Warwick's brother's estate
And with Henry and his (Henry) son out of the way, Richard's next goal is to eliminate George and Edward
Edward's son has been born, and George and Richard kiss the child
